default: 285g/10oz mini pimiento peppers, from a jar, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the olive oil in a small pan, add the pimiento peppers, garlic, Tabasco sauce, salt, freshly ground black pepper and white wine. Simmer gently for 5 minutes until thickened.
Add the cooked tagliatelle and stir well to ensure the sauce is evenly distributed.
To serve, pour into a bowl and sprinkle with fresh basil.
title: Spicy pimiento tagliatelle
